title: The Children of the city
creator_credit: Paul Rotha, Paul Rotha Productions and Budge Cooper
brief_description: This film illustrates how the Scottish Courts, under a recent Act of Parliament, treat the problems of juvenile delinquency, through the work of probation officers, child guidance clinics, and approved schools.
creator_credit_for_label: Paul Rotha, Paul Rotha Productions and Budge Cooper
